channel.title: Dual Monitors
channel.description:
http://xs127.xs.to/xs127/08225/img_0435787.jpg
Just got a new 22 inch widescreen LCD, along with my old 19 inch LCD.
What do you guys think of dual monitors? Productivity enhancing? Annoying? So far I've found it nothing but useful. Visual Studio on the widescreen, and msn on the other.

item.title: Dual Monitors
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Used Dual monitors for around 2 years, best thing ever. Can’t say a single thing bad about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Monitors
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

i used to use 2 monitors (17 inch crt and 15 inch lcd)
But the gap in the middle got annoying, so i just use the lcd now.

Some pcs at school have 8 monitors on them…
all working seperately. Must be on a fast pc…

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Monitors
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:209343”][quote author=Cruzer link=topic=275732.msg2250939#msg2250939 date=1212200928]
Wouldnt it be better to have two widescreens?
[/quote]
That is the idea. Though some people argue wide screens are a scam.

I believe Unhandled doesn’t have two widescreens due to cost implications.[/quote]
I have one widescreen and one normal one. As far as I know, 22 inch monitors are by default widescreen, it’s a lot harder to find large sized monitors that aren’t widescreen. Yeah, they don’t match and I’ve had to put some cardboard under one to even out the heights, but oh well, better than one 19 inch screen

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Monitors
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

That is the idea. Though some people argue wide screens are a scam.

I believe Unhandled doesn’t have two widescreens due to cost implications.

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Monitors
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Wouldnt it be better to have two widescreens?

Read full topic

item.title: Dual Monitors
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

When ever I am working at home on my laptop, (OKAY I SAY WORKING, I really mean pissing about on the computer), I usually always connect my 17" monitor to it so I have dual screens. I don’t know what it is, because I used to find it really annoying. But after a while I have really found it useful to have the extra room.

Read full topic
